Translations.Text: Mattu manavanige sankatavenadaru tattidare, avanu tannodeyanedege olidu, avanige more iduttane. Taruvaya avanu (allahanu) atanige tanna anugrahavannu daya palisidaga, atanu i hinde tanu yarige more ittiddenembudanne maretu biduttane mattu allahanige paludararannu nemisuttane â€“ avaru atanannu avana (allahana) dariyinda duragolisi biduttare. (Anthavanige) heliri; tusukala ninu ninna krtaghnateya sukhavannu anubhavisu. Ninu khandita narakavasiyagiruve

(avanu sresthano, athava) ratriya vele sastangaveragikondu, nintukondu aradhisutta, paralokada kuritu sada jagrtanagiddu, tanna odeyana anugrahavannu niriksisuttiruvavanu sresthano? Heliri; aritilladavaru mattu aritiruvavaru samanaragaballare? Bud'dhiyullavaru matra upadesavannu svikarisuttare
heliri; nanna (allahana) visvasi dasare, nim'ma odeyanige anjiri. I lokadalli olitannu madidavarige, olitu sigalide. Allahana bhumiyu visalavagide. Sahanasilarige apara pratiphala sigalide
heliri; nanagantu, nistheyannu allahanige misalagittu, avanannu aradhisalu adesisalagide
mattu nane prathamavagi muslima (saranagata)nagabekendu nanage adesisalagide
